divs: Sighting Detailsmy son and i was comming home after we had dinner at a resturant. as we pulled into our driveway, we saw a very large aircraft fly over our house as we was sitting in our car. this aircraft had a sharp point on the front of the craft, the wings curved aroud towards the back of the the craft. the lights were very bright on the bottom of the craft.
Summary: flying aircraft with a speer like nose, wings curved back towards back of aircraft.. lots of lights under the aircraft. made no noise as it flew over.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Granbury
There was one other sighting in Granbury on or around January 12th 2008
